about_the_game:
Relaxing Gameplay: Immerse yourself in a serene environment with soothing music and a calming atmosphere, perfect for unwinding.
Easy Design Process: Enjoy a stress-free, flow interior design experience with straightforward mechanics, making it simple to create beautiful interiors.
Cute Aesthetics: Delight in the adorable and whimsical art style, with rooms and furniture pieces designed to warm your heart.
Progression: Pay attention to your clients' requests and preferences to keep them happy and earn higher ranks while collecting signature designer stamps.
Unlock Your Creativity: Balance client needs with your own design vision to discover a style that's uniquely you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent with DirectX 10 capability
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Step into the charming world of Nook, a relaxing and delightful interior design game that lets your creativity shine effortlessly! As an aspiring interior designer, you'll have the opportunity to transform rooms into stunning masterpieces, tailored perfectly to your clients' tastes and preferences.
